page.title: 10Leisure In Whitby.
page.content: Whitby has two{Rowing Clubs}called 'Fisherlads' and 'Friendship'. Membership is for adults and children. The{Judo}and{Rifle Clubs}are also popular.There are many{Adult Evening {Education Classes}throughout the area. The{Whitby Seals}is a club for all ages where beginners can learn to swim and swimmers improve their technique. The{Cub,Brownie,Scout}and{Guide} {Movement}flourish in the area. Small{orchestras, bands}and{church {choirs}exist for the musically minded.Traditional{country and morris {dancing}is well supported. The{St.John's Ambulance Brigade}has long been established in the area.An 18 hole{Golf Course}is on the cliff top at the west end of town.{Whitby {Sea Anglers' Association}organise fishing trips out to sea.
